message.body: So it looks like it's not so terrible right now what you think
and thinking maybe we can do a cabTonight
That sounds fine. We'll see what it looks like later. It's supposed to get worse
Right I mean right now it's basically not doing anything but you're right they said it's getting worse tonight and honestly we can do dinner anytime so we can judge

I have work until six and I'm having my dad drive me to work so I'm not really sure how I'm going to get home because I feel bad to make him drive out so I might take a cab or the bus home from work. Do you want to try and decide around then like six if we want to go or not
Yeah let's do that. We can do dinner anytime.. No biggie.
Okay cool, so we will decide then.
But if you want to call it now that's fine too. Honestly doesn't matter to me.
Okay :)
We'll see
So I was thinking maybe we should reschedule. It'll probably be okay when we go, but coming home would probably be a nightmare and it'd be really hard to find a cab.
Yeh good thinking... It would figure the day we are trying to go out
I know! We can go somewhere next week?
Sure. I'm pretty free next week it seems, have any days in mind?
Monday or Thursday works for me
Perfect same... Tuesday?
I have work until 6, will you be okay to go?
Lol Tuesdays fine. I have a dentist appt that day
Yep that's fine
Okay great.
I know!! I was so mad last night seeing that nothing happened!!
So mad that the "snow storm" was all hype. Lol we could've had our nice dinner
I know! The whole time I was just thinking that we could've gone
The weather Definitely ruined a lot. I have off today and it's kinda bull... I'm not too mad because I'm doing homework but it's just annoying
Aw that sucks. Idk why they do school closings the night before. I remember waking up extra early and listening to kyw to see if we had school. Lol I feel so old.
Right!? I think it's the mayor! It's nuts I remember having my school shoes in my bad to change my boots
